channel.title: Wuxia Mysteries
channel.description:
On the Gauntlet Blog I offer a revised version of a *Hearts of Wulin* hack which blends in tech from *Brindlewood Bay*. With this you can play out satisfying mysteries in the vein of *Ancient Detective* and other investigative wuxia dramas.
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/wuxia-mysteries
I've also posted the second in a trilogy of linked sample mysteries for this framework. https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/tournament-of-death-a-hearts-of-wulin-mystery
